availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Jane Wyatt Cox. Father of E. N. Cox and S. B. Cox.
Kentucky native. Married Sarah Jane Wyatt Cox in Marshall County, Kentucky, in 1856. Farmer in Marshall County, Kentucky, in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. 146. Kentucky, Compiled Marriages, 1851-1900 Ancestry, Marshall County, 1856. Find A Grave, "James M. Cox (1835-1892)," Memorial #30738883, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=30738883&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016).
